Common Actions.example_sentence: Thinking before you speak is wise.

Challenging Words.example_sentence: It rained throughout the entire day.
She showed great strength during difficult times.

Challenging Words.meaning: To take air into the lungs and expel it
Challenging Words.example_sentence: Remember to breathe deeply and relax.

Challenging Words.meaning: Items worn to cover the body
Challenging Words.example_sentence: She bought new clothes for the interview.

Professional Terms.example_sentence: Good communication skills are essential in business.

Professional Terms.meaning: A formal talk given to an audience
Professional Terms.example_sentence: The presentation was informative and well-structured.
Clear pronunciation helps others understand you better.

Professional Terms.meaning: The clear expression of thoughts in speech
Professional Terms.example_sentence: Her articulation improved with speech therapy practice.

Professional Terms.meaning: The words used in a particular language
Professional Terms.example_sentence: Reading regularly helps expand your vocabulary.

I appreciate your feedback on the presentation.

dialogue.speaker: Doctor
dialogue.text: Good morning! What brings you in today?
dialogue.expected_response: Good morning, Doctor. I've been having some pain in my shoulder.

dialogue.speaker: Doctor
dialogue.text: How long have you been experiencing this pain?
dialogue.expected_response: It started about a week ago after I was gardening.

dialogue.speaker: Doctor
dialogue.text: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate the pain?
dialogue.expected_response: I'd say it's about a 6 or 7 out of 10.

dialogue.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue.text: Can you tell me about your previous work experience?
dialogue.expected_response: I have five years of experience in customer service, where I developed strong communication skills.

dialogue.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue.text: What do you consider your greatest strength?
dialogue.expected_response: I believe my greatest strength is my ability to work well with people from diverse backgrounds.

dialogue.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue.text: Why are you interested in this position?
dialogue.expected_response: I'm excited about this opportunity because it aligns with my career goals and values.

dialogue.speaker: Server
dialogue.text: Welcome! Are you ready to order?
dialogue.expected_response: Yes, I'd like the grilled chicken with vegetables, please.

dialogue.speaker: Server
dialogue.text: How would you like that cooked?

dialogue.speaker: Server
dialogue.text: What would you like to drink?
dialogue.expected_response: I'll have a glass of water with lemon, thank you.

tongue_twisters.text: She sells seashells by the seashore
tongue_twisters.tip: Focus on the difference between 'S' and 'SH' sounds

tongue_twisters.text: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers
tongue_twisters.tip: Keep lips firm and explosive for clear P sounds

tongue_twisters.text: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
tongue_twisters.tip: Maintain clear W sound at the beginning and crisp CH sounds

tongue_twisters.text: Red leather, yellow leather, red leather, yellow leather
tongue_twisters.tip: Pay careful attention to tongue position for L and R sounds

tongue_twisters.text: The sixth sick sheik's sixth sheep's sick
tongue_twisters.tip: Break down into smaller segments and practice slowly first

tongue_twisters.text: Unique New York, unique New York, you know you need unique New York
tongue_twisters.tip: Focus on clear vowel sounds and precise articulation

reading_passages.title: The Importance of Clear Speech
reading_passages.text: Clear speech helps people understand each other better. When we speak clearly, we can share our ideas and feelings more effectively. Practice makes our speech better over time.

reading_passages.title: Benefits of Speech Therapy
reading_passages.text: Speech therapy helps people improve their communication skills through various exercises and techniques. Regular practice with a qualified therapist can lead to significant improvements in pronunciation, fluency, and confidence.

reading_passages.title: The Art of Communication
reading_passages.text: Effective communication encompasses not only the words we choose but also how we deliver them. The rhythm, intonation, and clarity of our speech contribute significantly to how our message is received and understood by others.
